question: ‘The India Toy Fair’ was launched in which year?
explanation:
The Government of India has launched the ‘The India Toy Fair 2021’, to promote domestic manufacturing of toys.
It is to be held as a digitally accessible exhibition and platform to connect various stakeholders of Toy industry. The programme is scheduled from 27th February to 2nd March 2021. Webinars by State Governments, Knowledge sessions and Competitions are being planned.
